Hi everyone,

I am writing testcases for a Client/Server system. I am testi=
ng if the messages added by Client are actually added to the server.

I hav=
e a code where the Client application adds a message to the Server, now ser=
ver (which is though local on my machine) may take sometime to receive that=
 message. I make another object of Client(say Client II ) and asks this cli=
ent to get the messages from the server. This is done to test whether messa=
ges are being added to the server by Client-I. Server never responds to the=
 client which adds the message to it. So it is neccessary to have another C=
lient listening if the message has been added to the server.

But my tests =
fail as the Client II created to listen to the messages added by Client-I d=
oesnot get messages due to time some time delay in adding and retreiving th=
e messages. I cannot specify any time frame in which a message may be recei=
ved. (though i tried putting a dealy of say 100 milliseconds, but this does=
 not work all time, as sometime it may take about 100/200/500 milliseconds =
for the message to be added to the server). So i cannot depend on time dela=
y.

Please let me know if you have ideas to test such a system.

Manpreet
